title: Not receiving chests for S- and above results even though I have chests available?
body: This has happened quite a number of times over the past month and I'm not sure why. I haven't been paying enough attention to know exactly when it started, however, I would be interested to hear a reason why or any others experiencing the same issue.

replies.body: Remember to create the champions after receiving them from leveling up
You also have to own the champion.
I've had it come up saying I must own the champion to get it's mastery chest. I own the champion took 3 more s till I actually got the chest lol
Have you already received chests on the champions you are playing? You can only earn one chest per champ per season.
